One longtime GOP presidential-campaign adviser supportive of Mitt Romney puts it more bluntly: Hanging around waiting for the Tea Party to find you should Mitt Romney stumble is hardly a proven nominating strategy. But being a movement conservative from the American heartland with two successful gubernatorial terms under your belt is more Reaganesque than- Reagan. Vin Weber , who is a Tim Pawlenty adviser, is an admirer of Mike Pence . "I'm not surprised," he says. "I think it's the right decision for him."

were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. The doctors couldn't believe it, Debbie Wasserman Schultz later told CNN. "It was the most incredible experience that I have ever had." Gabrielle Giffords is expected to survive, although her condition and the extent of her recovery remain in doubt.

In recent months, Eric Schmidt had assumed more of an ambassador role for Google Inc. , which is under heavy scrutiny from regulators in the United States and abroad and faces growing questions about its ability to innovate and

startups such as Groupon Google Inc. in social networking, entertainment and retail. As executive chairman, "a lot of my time" will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said. We've got very complicated government issues, he said, adding that "we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale."
